content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's start with the rental price. I want to get the highest price possible, so make me an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see, the apartment is really nice. Based on the location and size of the apartment, I think a price of 650 Euros per month would be fair.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your offer, Maryam, but I'm looking for a higher price. I want to get the most out of my property, so I suggest 800 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see, the price you're asking for is a bit high for me. Considering the fact that the apartment is unfurnished, I think 700 Euros per month would be more reasonable.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand that 700 Euros is lower than what I'm looking for. How about we meet in the middle? A price of 750 Euros per month would be a fair compromise, don't you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds more reasonable to me. I agree to the price of 750 Euros per month!
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of [750] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Maryam. I appreciate the quick and straightforward negotiation. I'm sure you'll enjoy your stay in the apartment. Please let me know if you have any questions about the property or the lease.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you, Maryam. If you have no further questions about the rental price, please feel free to move on to the next topic. If not, please make another inquiry about the rental price, and I'll respond accordingly.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Maryam. I wish you a great day and a pleasant stay in Munich. If you have any other questions, please let me know.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you, Maryam. I hope we have the opportunity to work together again in the future. Have a great day!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
